analysis:
ADBE Bullish Bull-Put Spread
Step 1 – Sell to Open 1x ADBE 700 Put, Aug 15 2025, for $12.40 credit (Underlying price $751.22, 2025-07-21 11:45 ET)
Step 2 – Buy to Open 1x ADBE 690 Put, Aug 15 2025, for $9.25 debit (Underlying price $751.22, 2025-07-21 11:45 ET)
Step 3 – Target a net credit of $3.15, with a minimum acceptable fill of $3.00.
Step 4 – Risk exit rule: close if price hits stop or short-leg delta ≥ 0.35.
Step 5 – Profit exit rule: close when 50% of credit is captured or 21 days remain.
Why this works – The trade capitalizes on high implied volatility (IV Rank 72%) ahead of the widely anticipated Adobe MAX keynote on August 5, 2025.
